---
description: 'Prompt for creating an Architecture Decision Record (ADR)'
---

# Architecture Decision Record (ADR) Prompt

## Title

Provide a short, descriptive title for the decision.

## Status

What is the status of this decision? (e.g., Proposed, Accepted, Deprecated, Superseded)

## Context

Describe the background, relevant requirements, and any constraints or forces at play.

## Decision

Clearly state the architectural decision that has been made.

## Rationale

Explain why this decision was made, including alternatives considered and reasons for rejection.

## Consequences

Describe the positive and negative consequences of this decision.

## References

List any relevant documents, links, or resources.
